languages.text: {n}Целый сноп толстых кабелей выходит из разломанной стенки когитатора — их явно добавили сюда после того, как машина сошла с лент мануфакторума. Провода стелятся по полу и исчезают в техническом люке, уходя куда-то вниз.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Целый сноп толстых кабелей выходит из разломанной стенки когитатора — их явно добавили сюда после того, как машина сошла с лент мануфакторума. Провода стелятся по полу и исчезают в техническом люке, уходя куда-то вниз.{/n}

languages.text: {n}A bundle of cables is coming from the broken side panel of the cogitator — they were clearly added after the machine came off the manufactorum's production line. The wires snake along the floor and disappear inside a maintenance hatch that leads to somewhere down below.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Целый сноп толстых кабелей выходит из разломанной стенки когитатора — их явно добавили сюда после того, как машина сошла с лент мануфакторума. Провода стелятся по полу и исчезают в техническом люке, уходя куда-то вниз.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}A bundle of cables is coming from the broken side panel of the cogitator — they were clearly added after the machine came off the manufactorum's production line. The wires snake along the floor and disappear inside a maintenance hatch that leads to somewhere down below.{/n}

{n}A bundle of cables is coming from the broken side panel of the cogitator — they were clearly added after the machine came off the manufactorum's production line. The wires snake along the floor and disappear inside a maintenance hatch that leads to somewhere down below.{/n}

languages.text: {n}一大捆电缆从沉思者破损的侧板中伸了出来。很现在，这些电缆是在这台沉思者造好之后才被连接上去的。这些电缆沿着地板蜿蜒而下，消失在某个通往下部区域的维修舱口内。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}A bundle of cables is coming from the broken side panel of the cogitator — they were clearly added after the machine came off the manufactorum's production line. The wires snake along the floor and disappear inside a maintenance hatch that leads to somewhere down below.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}一大捆电缆从思考器破损的侧板中伸了出来。很现在，这些电缆是在这台思考器造好之后才被连接上去的。这些电缆沿着地板蜿蜒而下，消失在某个通往下部区域的维修舱口内。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Un fardo de cables surge del panel lateral roto del cogitador, claramente un añadido posterior a su producción en el manufactorum. Los cables serpentean por el suelo hasta perderse en el interior de una compuerta de mantenimiento que conduce a los niveles inferiores.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}A bundle of cables is coming from the broken side panel of the cogitator — they were clearly added after the machine came off the manufactorum's production line. The wires snake along the floor and disappear inside a maintenance hatch that leads to somewhere down below.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Un fardo de cables surge del panel lateral roto del cogitador, claramente un añadido posterior a su producción en el manufactorum. Los cables serpentean por el suelo hasta perderse en el interior de una compuerta de mantenimiento que conduce a los niveles inferiores.{/n}

languages.text: {n}考算機の壊れたサイドパネルからケーブルの束が出ている。これは明らかに、機械が聖工場の製造ラインから外された後に追加されたものだった。ワイヤーは床に沿って蛇行し、メンテナンス用ハッチの中に消えていく。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}A bundle of cables is coming from the broken side panel of the cogitator — they were clearly added after the machine came off the manufactorum's production line. The wires snake along the floor and disappear inside a maintenance hatch that leads to somewhere down below.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}考算機の壊れたサイドパネルからケーブルの束が出ている。これは明らかに、機械が聖工場の製造ラインから外された後に追加されたものだった。ワイヤーは床に沿って蛇行し、メンテナンス用ハッチの中に消えていく。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Ein Bündel von Kabeln kommt aus dem kaputten Seitenteil des Cogitators – eindeutig erst hinzugefügt, nachdem die Maschine das Fließband des Manufactorums längst verlassen hatte. Die Kabel schlängeln sich über den Boden und verschwinden in einer Wartungsklappe, die irgendwohin nach unten führt.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}A bundle of cables is coming from the broken side panel of the cogitator — they were clearly added after the machine came off the manufactorum's production line. The wires snake along the floor and disappear inside a maintenance hatch that leads to somewhere down below.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Ein Bündel von Kabeln kommt aus dem kaputten Seitenteil des Cogitators – eindeutig erst hinzugefügt, nachdem die Maschine das Fließband des Manufactorums längst verlassen hatte. Die Kabel schlängeln sich über den Boden und verschwinden in einer Wartungsklappe, die irgendwohin nach unten führt.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Plusieurs câbles sortent d'un panneau latéral cassé, visiblement branchés après que le cogitateur a quitté la chaîne de fabrication du manufactorum. Ils serpentent sur le sol et disparaissent dans une trappe de maintenance qui mène plus bas.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}A bundle of cables is coming from the broken side panel of the cogitator — they were clearly added after the machine came off the manufactorum's production line. The wires snake along the floor and disappear inside a maintenance hatch that leads to somewhere down below.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Plusieurs câbles sortent d'un panneau latéral cassé, visiblement branchés après que le cogitateur a quitté la chaîne de fabrication du manufactorum. Ils serpentent sur le sol et disparaissent dans une trappe de maintenance qui mène plus bas.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Kavramsayarın kırık yan panelinden bir yığın kablo çıkıyor. Belli ki makine, manufaktorumdan çıktıktan sonra eklenmişler. Zeminde kıvrılan kablolar, ucu aşağılarda bir yere açılan bir bakım kapağına gidiyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}A bundle of cables is coming from the broken side panel of the cogitator — they were clearly added after the machine came off the manufactorum's production line. The wires snake along the floor and disappear inside a maintenance hatch that leads to somewhere down below.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Kavramsayarın kırık yan panelinden bir yığın kablo çıkıyor. Belli ki kablolar, makine imalat hattını terk ettikten sonra eklenmiş. Zeminde kıvrılan kablolar, ucu aşağılarda bir yere açılan bir bakım bölmesine gidiyor.{/n}
